overview: A man wakes up in a Koreatown hallway, naked except for a cock ring and a frilly scarf.  Shot in one continuous five-minute take on the Digital Bolex D16 camera, "Coming To" is Happy Canyon Club's Slamdance Grand-Prize-winning short film about picking up the pieces after a meth relapse. It is a story about loneliness, the search for identity, and the difficult choice between safety and happiness.
title: Coming To
